faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Moving and Transport
faqs.subtitle: We answer your questions about moving services, transport and logistics in Marbella and Costa del Sol

faq1.question: How much does a move cost?
faq1.answer: The price of a move varies depending on several factors: type of property (apartment, house, office), distance, volume of items, additional services (packing, assembly) and urgency. Use our online calculator to get a free approximate quote without commitment, or request a detailed personalized quote.

faq2.question: How to calculate the price of a move?
faq2.answer: You can calculate the price of your move using our online calculator on the main page. You just need to indicate the route (origin and destination), type of property, special items (pianos, works of art) and additional services. You can also request a free personalized quote without commitment to get an exact price.

faq3.question: What does a professional moving service include?
faq3.answer: Our complete professional moving service includes: professional packing with all materials, loading and unloading, safe transport with suitable vehicles, furniture assembly at destination, complete insurance for your belongings and real-time tracking. We also offer partial services according to your needs.

faq4.question: How to hire a move?
faq4.answer: To hire a move with PortesPro, you can use our online calculator to get an approximate quote, request a free personalized quote, or contact us directly by phone or WhatsApp. Once the quote is agreed, we plan the moving date and our professionals take care of the entire process.

faq5.question: Do you include packing in the move price?
faq5.answer: Yes, in our complete move packages we include professional packing at no additional cost. Our team comes to your home with all necessary materials (boxes, bubble wrap, film, blankets) and performs complete packing of your items. You can also hire only the packing service if you do the move yourself.

faq6.question: How long does a move take?
faq6.answer: The time of a move depends on the volume of items, distance and complexity. A local move (Marbella, Málaga, Costa del Sol) can take 4 to 8 hours for a standard home. Interprovincial or national moves can take 1 to 3 days. We provide an estimated schedule when planning your move.

faq7.question: Do you offer urgent moves?
faq7.answer: Yes, we offer urgent moves and 24-hour express moves for situations requiring immediate relocation. Our team is available 24/7 for urgent moves in Marbella and Costa del Sol. Contact us for an urgent quote and we will help you as soon as possible.

faq8.question: What guarantees do moves have?
faq8.answer: All our moves include complete insurance to protect your belongings during transport. Additionally, we offer satisfaction guarantee and civil liability. Our team consists of certified professionals with years of experience. If any damage occurs, our insurance policy covers transported items according to our conditions.

faq1.question: How much does storage cost?
faq1.answer: Storage price varies according to size and storage duration. We offer storage from 45€/month with discounts for long-term contracts.

faq2.question: Are warehouses climate-controlled?
faq2.answer: Yes, all our storage units and warehouses are climate-controlled with air conditioning and temperature control to protect your belongings from heat and humidity.

faq3.question: What security do storage units have?
faq3.answer: Our secure storage units include 24-hour surveillance, alarms, security cameras and controlled access.

faq4.question: Can I access my items whenever I want?
faq4.answer: Yes, our storage units offer 24/7 access so you can access your belongings whenever you need them.

faq5.question: Do storage units include insurance?
faq5.answer: Yes, all our storage units include complete insurance to protect your stored items during the storage period.

faq6.question: What is the minimum storage size?
faq6.answer: The minimum storage size is 2m³, although we recommend a minimum of 3m³ for greater comfort and space utilization.

material5.description: Cardboard separators and corner protectors for glass and mirrors.

faq1.question: What does the professional packing service include?
faq1.answer: Our professional packing service includes our experts coming to your home with all necessary materials (cardboard boxes, bubble wrap, plastic film, protection blankets) and performing complete packing of your items. You don't need to buy anything, we bring the materials and do the work.

faq2.question: How much does the packing service cost?
faq2.answer: The price of the professional packing service varies according to the type of move and number of items. We offer complete packing included in complete moves at no additional cost, or partial packing only for fragile items. Request a personalized quote without commitment.

faq3.question: Is packing included in the moving price?
faq3.answer: Yes, we offer packing included at no additional cost in our complete move packages. Our professional team comes to your home with all materials and performs complete packing. You can also hire complete professional packing or partial packing only for fragile items.

faq4.question: How do you pack fragile items like glass and porcelain?
faq4.answer: Our professional packing service for fragile items includes specific multi-layer protection: bubble wrap or bubble plastic, cardboard separators and corner protectors. Our experts know the proper techniques to protect glass, porcelain, tableware and artwork during transport.

faq5.question: Do they have to come to my house to do the packing?
faq5.answer: Yes, our professional packing service is performed at your home. Our team comes with all necessary materials (boxes, bubble wrap, film, blankets) and performs complete packing on site. You don't need to buy or prepare anything, we take care of everything.

faq6.question: What type of packing do you do for appliances?
faq6.answer: For appliances like refrigerators, freezers and washing machines, our professional packing service includes special protection covers, stretch film and furniture blankets. We protect each appliance with specific materials to prevent damage during transport.

faq1.question: What temperatures do you handle for cold transport?
faq1.answer: We handle different temperature ranges according to the product: freezing at -18°C, refrigerated between 2°C and 8°C, and controlled temperature for pharmaceutical products according to regulations.

faq2.question: How much does cold transport cost?
faq2.answer: The price of cold transport varies according to distance, required temperature range and type of product. Request a personalized quote without commitment with our online calculator.

faq3.question: Do you have refrigerated vehicles?
faq3.answer: Yes, we have a fleet of refrigerated vehicles equipped with temperature control systems to guarantee the cold chain at all times.

faq4.question: Can you transport pharmaceutical products?
faq4.answer: Yes, we offer specialized pharmaceutical transport with strict temperature control according to current regulations and complete process tracking.

faq5.question: Do you offer real-time tracking?
faq5.answer: Yes, all our cold transports include real-time tracking so you can know the location and temperature of your shipment at all times.

faq6.question: What do you guarantee for the cold chain?
faq6.answer: We guarantee cold chain maintenance throughout transport with continuous temperature controls, certified refrigerated vehicles and documented process tracking.

faq1.question: What is last mile logistics?
faq1.answer: Last mile logistics is the last leg of the delivery process, from the distribution center to the final recipient. It is the most critical and costly phase of the logistics chain.

faq2.question: How much does last mile service cost?
faq2.answer: The price of last mile service varies according to distance, delivery type (express, same day, scheduled) and sector (ecommerce, food, pharmacy). Request a personalized quote without commitment with our online calculator.

faq3.question: Do you offer same day delivery?
faq3.answer: Yes, we offer same day delivery for orders placed before 2:00 PM in urban area of Marbella and surroundings. We also offer express service for urgent deliveries.

faq4.question: Do you have real-time tracking?
faq4.answer: Yes, all our last mile services include real-time tracking so you can know the exact location of your shipment at all times through our app or web platform.

faq5.question: In which areas do you operate?
faq5.answer: We operate in Marbella and Costa del Sol with urban, peripheral and rural coverage. We cover residential areas, developments and more remote nuclei with different delivery times.

faq6.question: Can you integrate your service with my system?
faq6.answer: Yes, we offer API integration to connect our last mile service with your management system, online store or marketplace. Our technical team will help you with the implementation.
